title: Implement randomized holdout/control assignment for recommendations (with logging)

sections.text: Add a deterministic bucketing mechanism to assign reps/accounts/opportunities into control vs treatment for each recommendation type/model_version, and suppress recommendations for control when applicable. Emit an analytics event capturing assignment (bucket, unit_id, recommendation_type, model_version, timestamp) so outcomes can be compared against a true baseline. Ensure bucketing is stable over time (no re-randomization) and configurable per surface to support gradual rollout.
